root.name: pop'n music 2
root.description: Pop'n Music 2 was the first game in the series to work as a Key Disc, which allowed disc swapping with an Append Disc. CS version song list(Numbers represent difficulty level for Normal / Hyper ) Arcade Version SongsMASARA / すてきなタブーラ / TABAN KING (Karli) - 7 / -MELLOW / 光の季節 / ANNA (SANAE Chan) - 9 / -IDOL GIRL / LOVE FIRE / 長沢ゆりか (Judy) - 12 / -VISUAL / WHITE BIRDS / violent age (Yuli) - 13 / -EURO QUEEN / what i want (Euro Mix) / T.R.S (KoKo) - 15 / -NEO ACO / (fly higher than) the stars / sugi reo (Sugi Kun) - 16 / -DIGI ROCK / ROSE~恋人よ、薔薇色に染まれ / BROKE (Timer) - 16 / -ANIME HERO R / はばたけ、ザ・グレートギャンブラー / さくし:RYO うた:水木一郎 (Hiroshi Jugu) - 16 / -ENKA / お江戸花吹雪 / 高田香里 (S.B. Taro) - 18 / -POP RAP / Smile The Night Away / Scotty D (Kraft?) - 20 / -GIRLY / Love Is Strong To The Sky / SAORI (Rie Chan) - 22 / -HEAVY METAL / I'm on fire / AD/DA (Dami~Yan) - 23 / -BONUS TRACK / すれちがう二人 / apresmidi (SANAE Chan) - 14 / -RAVE / e-motion / e.o.s (Rave Girl) - 20 / - CS Original SongsNEW WAVE / Don't Disturb / Color Essence (Silvy) - 7 / - URBAN POP / Prism Heart / Sana (Mrs. Wilson) - 8 / H CANDY POP / Give me your pain / Haya-P Maru (Cindy) - 13 / - FUNNY / PULSE / 319 (Boy) - 14 / - CARIBBEAN / 麗しのカーディガン / Akko's (Olivia) - 16 / - CLASSIC 2 / R.C. / Waldeus von Dovjak (Harmanov) - 18 / H Returning SongsFANTASY / monde des songe / Bikke (DiNO) - 5 / - J-TEKNO / Quick Master / Act Deft (Sholl Kee) - 6 / -LATIN / El Pais del sol / Senorita Rica (Don Mommy) - 7 / -RAP / YOUNG DREAM / Little Fingers (Uncle Jam) - 8 / -POPS / I Really Want To Hurt You / Sugi Reo (Rie Chan) - 10 / -DANCE / Hi-Tekno / Hi-Tekno (Judy) - 12 / -REGGAE / Baby, I'm yours / Lisa T (Olivia) - 13 / -TECHNO POP / Electronic Fill / Windslope (Kraft) - 14 / -J-POP / Life / Haya-P Maru (Pretty) - 14 / -AFRIKA / con te sabi 2119 / J-Kane (Unbabo) - 14 / HANIME HERO / 闘え！ギャンブラーＺ / Ryo NARAMCHA (Toru Kamikaze) - 16 / -FUSION / CROSSOVER 12 / 319 (Sylvester) - 16 / -DISCO QUEEN / what i want / The Ritchie Sisters (Chanel) - 18 / -TECHNO '80 / Water Melon Woman / NAKATEK (Boy) - 19 / HDISCO KING / FUNKY TOWN '75 / JV THE SEXY MACHINE GUN (Bamboo) - 22 / -CLASSIC / Chaos Age / J-Kane (Harmonof) - 22 / HSPY / Spicy piece / Original Sound Tracks (Charly) - 23 / - Hidden SongsLOUNGE / Cherry Raquel / The Ebisu Singers (Reo Kun) - 14 / -J-RB / Sayonara / ANNA (Tourmaline) - 13 / -SEXY GIRLS / 淋しくてLoneliness / ワンダース (Meifa) - 21 / HCUTE / 取り返してやる！～Again,My Lovely Day～ / Akko's (Anzu) - 5 / - HNEW FOLK / 走れブン！ブン！ / わがまま7 (Flower) - 15 / -J-GARAGE POP / Miracle Moon(お月様が中継局) / Togo Project feat. Sana (Kelly) - 17 / HAKIBA / E.C.M. / PAPEHINA meets Haya-P (Shorky) - 13 / -AVANTGARDE / Bee's Eye / Waldeus von Dovjak (Edward) - 23 / HLIVE / Theme of staff roll ～special mix～ / きまぐれポッパーズ (Poppers) - 11 / - CS Unlock InformationSongs are gradually unlocked with play time, a new song being unlocked every half hour to an hour. The first song, Cute, will be unlocked after the first 2 hours of gameplay. All songs will have been unlocked after 7 hours of gameplay.To unlock Cute, clear Beginner Mode.To unlock New Folk, select a CS character (eg, Cindy) and clear New Wave.To unlock Sexy Girls, clear Urban Pop as your first stage, then Disco Queen or Euro Queen as your second stage.To unlock J-Garage Pop, select Rave Girl as your character and clear any song as your first stage with 85% or more greats, then clear Rave as your second stage with 85% or more greats.To unlock J-RB, get a triple 7, triple 5, or triple 3 on the last column of your result screen or either your first or second stage. For example, 203 greats, 33 goods, and 3 bads would qualify.To unlock Akiba, clear the Beginner Course in Marathon Mode.To unlock Live, clear the Half Course in Marathon Mode.To unlock Avantgarde, clear the Full Course on Marathon Mode.
